column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Tuesday March 24 at 4:00 p.m.

column4: Roadway shutdown in both directions between W Second St and W Third St due to a damaged electrical pole as a result of a collision.
UPDATE 3:08 p.m. - Outbound Broadway is now open.  Inbound Broadway remains shutdown at W Third St as KU continues with repairs.
UPDATE 3:14 p.m. - Cleared.  N Broadway now open in both directions.
